events.title: Ajolotes en la Nube|AWS Community Builder: Verdades, Mitos y lo que Nadie te Cuenta|Online
events.description:
AWS User Group: Ajolotes en la Nube
**¬øSientes que para ser AWS Community Builder necesitas saberlo todo sobre la nube?** ¬øCrees que necesitas 10 certificaciones o ser un influencer para entrar al programa? **¬°Error!**

En este Meetup vamos a desmitificar el proceso de selecci√≥n de los AWS Community Builders. Exploraremos la realidad detr√°s del programa: desde los beneficios reales (¬°s√≠, hay cr√©ditos de AWS y SWAG!) hasta el verdadero compromiso de compartir conocimiento.

No se trata de ser un experto infalible o tener miles de seguidores; se trata de ser un apasionado que aporta valor a la comunidad.

Analizaremos qu√© es lo que realmente eval√∫a el equipo de AWS y c√≥mo puedes preparar una aplicaci√≥n ganadora sin importar tu nivel actual.

**Puntos a tratar:**

* **Mito vs. Realidad:** Lo que realmente importa en tu aplicaci√≥n y lo que puedes dejar de lado.
* **Los 4 pilares del programa:** C√≥mo equilibrar Contenido, Comunidad, Conocimiento y Colaboraci√≥n.
* **An√°lisis de aplicaciones exitosas:** Ejemplos reales de a√±os anteriores que lograron el "S√≠".
* **Sesi√≥n de "Checklist":** Una revisi√≥n pr√°ctica para ver si est√°s listo para la convocatoria actual.

¬°Es tu momento de brillar en el ecosistema global de AWS! Te esperamos para despejar todas tus dudas.
events.hash_key: aws community builder verdades mitos y l_2026-01-13T00:00:00+00:00

events.title: DevOps Workshop|Improving Kubernetes with Bottlerocket|Online
events.description:
DevOps Workshop
Devopers, muy feliz 2026, ya tenemos tema para nuestro primer meetup del a√±o.

AWS cre√≥ Bottlerocket para proporcionar una mejor base para ejecutar contenedores en sus servicios, en particular:

* Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service)
* Amazon ECS (Elastic Container Service)

Bottlerocket no reemplaza a Amazon Linux. Sirven para diferentes prop√≥sitos y coexistir√°n.

Bottlerocket y Talos Linux son probablemente los m√°s similares en filosof√≠a: ambos deshabilitan el acceso SSH por defecto y utilizan una configuraci√≥n basada en API, lo que los hace muy adecuados para patrones de infraestructura inmutables.

La transmisi√≥n ser√°, como siempre, por nuestro canal de Youtube.
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6Yrw_zDWoc](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6Yrw_zDWoc)

saludos,
events.hash_key: improving kubernetes with bottlerocket_2026-01-14T00:00:00+00:00

Kong/MEXICO-CITY
**[Register Here](https://konghq.com/events/webinars/developer-day-leading-the-agentic-transformation-a-blueprint-for-the-ai-native-enterprise?utm_source=kong-email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=community/)**

**DEVELOPER DAY**

The shift from static AI chatbots to autonomous, goal-oriented agents represents the most significant architectural shift in a decade. This agentic transformation requires more than just new models; it demands a fundamental evolution of our connectivity infrastructure. In this closing session for our AI Gateway series, we will synthesize the lessons from our 101 and 201 Workshops to show how Kong is being engineered to serve as the backbone for this new era.

We will explore the technical roadmap for supporting multi-agent orchestration, the role of the gateway in managing "machine-to-machine" reasoning, and how Kong‚Äôs future-state features will accelerate your organization‚Äôs agentic transformation while maintaining absolute security and cost-control.

In preparation for the Developer Day, take a look at our 101 & 201 Workshops:

* [\[Workshop 101\] Build an Enterprise-Grade AI Platform with Kong AI Gateway](https://konghq.com/events/workshops/workshop-101-build-an-enterprise-grade-ai-platform-with-kong-ai-gateway)
* [\[Workshop 201\] Beyond the Gateway: Governing Secure and Observable AI Agents](https://konghq.com/events/workshops/workshop-201-beyond-the-gateway-governing-secure-and-observable-ai-agents)

events.title: Kong Mexico City|Monetizing the Agentic Era|M√©xico|CDMX
events.description:
Kong/MEXICO-CITY
As enterprises move past the "experimentation" phase of AI, the challenge is no longer just managing spend‚Äîit‚Äôs capturing value. To truly raise the ceiling on AI ROI, organizations must transition from basic cost-tracking to sophisticated, revenue-driven monetization strategies. In this webinar, you‚Äôll learn how Kong Konnect Metering & Billing provides a centralized metering and billing layer for AI and APIs‚Äîso teams can accurately track usage, control spend, and allocate costs with confidence to the correct business unit or customer.
By leveraging billing-grade metering, natively integrated across your Kong dataplanes, you can move beyond gross margin protection to active revenue optimization. We'll show you how to empower your product teams to adjust pricing in minutes not weeks and move from defensive "cost-governance" to offensive, outcome-aligned monetization.
What you‚Äôll learn:

* Click to enable metering against all Kong Konnect managed AI and API Gateways.
* Design a practical AI API features model to track usage and total cost aligned to the business value aligned metrics
* Use a no-code product catalog to launch multi-service products with hybrid pricing
* Create service tiers and bundle functional add-ons allowing to support upselling premium capabilities.
* Leverage real-time billing data and invoice generation to automate chargebacks and prepare your AI infrastructure for external commercialization.

Walk away with practical strategies to implement no-code metering & billing, tapping into new revenue streams without sacrificing performance, and ensure AI investments deliver measurable ROI.

events.title: Kong Mexico City|Why AI Connectivity Matters|Online
events.description:
Kong/MEXICO-CITY
[AI is reshaping enterprise connectivity‚Äîturning it into a strategic lever for speed, cost control, and competitive advantage.](https://konghq.com/blog/news/the-age-of-ai-connectivity)

The problem is fragmentation. Most organizations have different tools, policies, and teams managing each connection point in their AI data path. The result: latency compounds, costs spiral, and governance becomes impossible at scale.

Join Kong CEO Augusto Marietti and CTO Marco Palladino for a candid conversation on how to unify your entire AI data path‚Äîfrom agents to models to tools‚Äîand move from pilot experiments to production scale. You'll also hear from SVP of Product Reza Shafii and Head of Product Marketing Alex Drag on what's new and what's coming in 2026: the Agentic Trust Layer, Agent Gateway, AI-native WAF, real-time data monetization, and comprehensive AI cost governance‚Äîthe infrastructure layer enterprises need to operationalize AI. Learn how to prepare your stack for the demands of AI-native architecture.

Whether you're building AI governance, controlling costs, or planning your next generation of AI infrastructure, this is where the decisions that define the next decade get made.
